dictionary.name: tables
dictionary.phrase: select table_name from information_schema.tables where table_name = ?

CREATE TABLE eaa_item_value_cache ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, "old" INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', created TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL, typeid INTEGER NOT NULL, region VARCHAR(2000) NOT NULL, buy_vol BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', sell_vol BIGINT NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', sell_price DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', buy_price DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', move DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL DEFAULT '-1' );

CREATE TABLE eaa_profile_log ( "id" SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, "log_time" INTEGER, "guid" VARCHAR(100), "program" VARCHAR(300), "in_out" VARCHAR(5), "path_info" VARCHAR(300), "mem_change" INTEGER, "duration" DOUBLE PRECISION, "query_data" bytea );
